title.narrative: Raising Ambition and Accelerating Action to Protect and Restore Forests

description.narrative: Raising Ambition and Accelerating Action to Protect and Restore Forests (RAAPRF) is an ambitious five-year project. Interventions with aim to transform financial markets, leveraging the power of finance to Financial Institutions and Regulators stimulate deforestation free commodity production. Work with will drive the transition of a Purchasing Companies and Suppliers critical group of companies to eliminate deforestation from supply chains we will use data and insights to tailor evidence-based; policy recommendations to incorporate and drive private sector action on REDD+ and other forest sector policies, in line with achieving increased NDC ambition on forests with Policy Maker.
